name: ZIEL
description:
Half visual novel, half adventure game.

ZIEL is a short demo set in 2051, after humanity faced extiction, and the few survivors were forced to enter a safe zone called "The Dome".

There are prople from all over the world inside The Dome, but Irene preferred to stay with the people she really cared about - Ashley, Rox, Ken, Amy and Alex.

Until Volpe showed up in her mind.

Irene just wanted a quiet life, but Volpe knew she was there for a specific reason.

Volpe can make Irene forget her memories. Her worst memories.

 ===============================================================

Explore The Dome, forget all the negative memories and don't let Irene suffer.

She doesn't have to suffer anymore, okay? Even if it means forgetting everything.

===============================================================

This demo was done in 4 months, with no experience in gamedev: I didn't know how to write code, how to create sprites, how to basically do anything. It's just a little story I've had for a long time, and I liked to tell it through a videogame.

If you want to know more, join the discord!

It would be really helpful if, once you completed the demo, you would like to fill out this survey.

===============================================================

Ver. 021 // More or less halfway through the first chapter. 

If I have time to continue this project, there will be 6 chapters of 30mins each. 

Tell me if you would like to see more!
